com.chdryra.android.mygenerallibrary

Class GridViewCellAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • BaseAdapter
      • com.chdryra.android.mygenerallibrary.GridViewCellAdapter
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    FragmentReviewBuild.ReviewOptionsGridCellAdapter

    public class GridViewCellAdapter
extends BaseAdapter
    Allows a collection of items that follow the GridViewable interface to be viewed as a sorted collection of grid cells in a GridView with a specified cell width and cell height.

    Uses the ViewHolder pattern in Android for views that use components from a limited reusable pool. Grid cell views are only searched for and inflated once then stored in the tags of the reuseable objects. The data within these is overwritten with whatever is required for their reuse. Aids memory and speed performance.

    See Also:
    ViewHolder pattern, ViewHolder, GVData

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  GridViewCellAdapter.GridViewable<T>
      Interface that a collection of items must follow if the items are to be viewable in a GridView using a GridViewCellAdapter.
